nodes.text: "Millie" was the name given to a MILL-247-EE emergency service droid on Tem Chesko's freighter. She had a female personality, and was built to resemble a green-skinned humanoid female. She had blue sensors.

Over the years, Millie developed a close relationship with Tem Chesko, the two being stranded on a ship for seventy years together, and once attempted to destroy herself when she believed he missed his girlfriend, Maia, more than he cared for her.
She eventually sacrificed herself, transplanting her mechanical pump into Tem's chest when his own heart gave out.
